entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
